setup_script_description: sets focus on the third cell of the second row in the grid
task: navigate to previous column from cel containing link in grid
specific_user_instruction: From a cell containing a link, navigate to the previous column in the grid.
output_assertions: Text of the column header ('Type') is conveyed
Text of the cell ('Deposit') is conveyed
coordinates of the cell (column 2, row 2) are conveyed
